mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" (EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , BLOCK_YN , LATEST_LOGIN_BLOCK_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE , DEL_YN) VALUES (#{email} , #{name} , #{password} , #{salt} , 0 , 'N' , NULL , NULL , NULL , 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , BLOCK_YN , LATEST_LOGIN_BLOCK_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE , DEL_YN FROM "MEMBER" WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = LOGIN_FAIL_CNT + 1 , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET BLOCK_YN = 'Y' , LATEST_LOGIN_BLOCK_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND LOGIN_FAIL_CNT >= 5 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET BLOCK_YN = 'N' , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = 0 , LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND BLOCK_YN = 'Y' AND LATEST_LOGIN_BLOCK_DATE <= SYSDATE - 1 / 24 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_NAME FROM "ROLE" START WITH ROLE_ID = (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}) CONNECT BY PRIOR ROLE_ID = TOP_ROLE
